title: Which Broadband Plan suits for home? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are looking to enjoy the best broadband plans for your home, you should try out the plans from Airtel. The plans start from as low as Rs. 799 a month. The Basic plan offers 150 GB internet a month and offers speeds up to 100 Mbps. Also, you can make unlimited local and STD calls through this. If you want to go higher, you have the Entertainment plan, offering 300 GB of INternet with speeds of 200 Mbps. The Premium plan has a data cap of 500 GB a month with speeds up to 300 Mbps. You can make unlimited calls with every plan from Airtel. The best plan that you can get for Rs. 3999 is the VIP plan, which allows unlimited Internet for the user, with speeds up to 1 Gbps. Along with all these broadband plans, you will even get the Airtel Thanks benefits, where you will get Amazon Prime and Netflix subscriptions. You can even get Zee5 Premium and Airtel XStream.
I have finally subscribed to ACT Fibernet and the basic plan starts from Rs.600 - 650 range, so I get superfast internet and enough data. Thanks guys for the answers.
